rules_text:
First strike, trample, haste
[i]Storms Release[/i] – When Yuzu, Stormcatcher Crane enters, there is an additional combat phase after this phase. Untap each creature you control at the beginning of each combat this turn.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Yuzu deals combat damage to a player, she deals damage equal to her power to target creature defending player controls.
